## Changing File Split Pattern

clean_metadata_me <- function{type, folder_base,included_subfolders = 'all',gps_locations = NULL,
                           file_split_pattern = "T|\\-|\\_|\\[",
                           site_pattern =  "[SW]\\d+_"}
                           
BarLT <- (grepl("bar", type, ignore.case = T) & grepl("lt", type, ignore.case = T))

ARUtools::clean_metadata("BarLT", Base_dir_SWMP,included_subfolders = 'all',gps_locations = NULL,
                           file_split_pattern = "T|\\-|\\_|\\[",
                           (site_pattern =  "\\d+_"))
